sentences.en: After that, we could go for esteem and respect.
sentences.cn: 而再往上，我们可能需要自尊和尊重。

sentences.en: He is held in high esteem by colleagues in the construction industry.
sentences.cn: 建筑业的同行们都非常敬重他。

sentences.en: He said he retained immense regard and esteem for the prime minister.
sentences.cn: 他说他一直极其尊重和敬仰首相。

sentences.en: He was esteemed as a literary wit.
sentences.cn: 他被尊为文学才子。

sentences.en: He was left without a shred of self-esteem.
sentences.cn: 他的自尊荡然无存。

sentences.en: I did not esteem him to be worthy of trust.
sentences.cn: 我认为他不值得信赖.

sentences.en: I esteem your uncle for his kindness, experience, and honesty.
sentences.cn: 我很钦佩你叔叔的善良 、 老练和诚实.

sentences.en: I greatly esteem your message in the midst of our hard struggle.
sentences.cn: 您在我们奋力抗争时发来的电文让我充满了敬意。

sentences.en: It is easy for children to lose their self - esteem .
sentences.cn: 孩子很容易失去 自尊.

sentences.en: It was so humiliating, a terrible blow to my self-esteem.
sentences.cn: 这件事如此丢脸，深深地挫伤了我的自尊心。

sentences.en: Peden was greatly esteemed by the people of Ayrshire.
sentences.cn: 佩登深受艾尔郡人的尊敬。

sentences.en: She does not want to knock down his self - esteem .
sentences.cn: 她不想挫他的 自尊.

sentences.en: She is held in high esteem by her colleagues.
sentences.cn: 她深受同事的敬重。

sentences.en: The critics held him in high esteem as an actor
sentences.cn: 作为演员，他深受评论家敬重。

sentences.en: The public, meanwhile, hold architects in low esteem.
sentences.cn: 与此同时，公众对建筑师并不看重。

sentences.en: The school's aim is to build the self - esteem of the children.
sentences.cn: 这所学校的目标是培养学生的 自尊.

sentences.en: Their public esteem has never been lower.
sentences.cn: 他们在公众中的信誉从未如此之低。

sentences.en: This is why I esteem the individual only because he strikes me as ridiculous and humiliated.
sentences.cn: 这是我为什么尊重个体，就是因为他让我深深地感到荒诞和屈辱。

sentences.en: We esteem Sigmund Freud as the father of psychoanalysis.
sentences.cn: 我们把西格蒙德·弗罗伊德看做精神分析学之父.

sentences.en: When self-esteem is high, we lose our mortal fear of jealousy.
sentences.cn: 自信心很强时，我们不再对妒忌感到极度惧怕。

trans.tran_en: a feeling of respect for someone, or a good opinion of someone
a feeling of respect for someone, or a good opinion of someone
to respect and admire someone or something
a feeling of respect for someone, or a good opinion of someone
to respect and admire someone or something
